director.name: 亚历山大·克鲁格 Alexander Kluge

introduction: Theorie der Erzählung (theory of narration, or narratology) – five lectures on aestetics, held by Alexander Kluge in Summer 2012 at the Johann Wolfgang Goethe University, Frankfurt. Including some short films by Kluge (Minutenfilme) and film excerpts (Abschied von gestern, 1966). With Michael Haneke, Hans-Magnus Enzensberger, Helge Schneider, and others (archive footage).Lecture 1: The rumbling of the swallowed world. The lives and the realLecture 2: The instruments for text and film. Poetics themselvesLecture 3: Masses of reality, waiting for narrationLecture 4: The irrefutability of narration
